action_steps.label: refrigerator

action_steps.action: 8. Take out any fresh fruit or snack inside.
action_steps.label: refrigerator

action_steps.action: 9. Close the refrigerator.
action_steps.label: refrigerator

action_steps.action: 10. Go back to the table and place the food next to the bottle.
action_steps.label: table

action_steps.action: 1. Go to the yellow suitcase inside the black or gray table.
action_steps.label: suitcase

action_steps.action: 2. Open the suitcase.
action_steps.label: suitcase

action_steps.action: 3. Walk to the cabinet lower than the other white kitchen cabinet.
action_steps.label: cabinet

action_steps.action: 4. Take out any necessary travel items or clothes from the cabinet.
action_steps.label: cabinet

action_steps.action: 5. Pack these items into the suitcase.
action_steps.label: suitcase

action_steps.action: 6. Zip up the suitcase.
action_steps.label: suitcase

action_steps.action: 7. Place the packed suitcase near the door for easy access.
action_steps.label: door

action_steps.action: 1. Pick up any dirty dishes from the wooden table.
action_steps.label: table

action_steps.action: 2. Carry the dishes to the stainless steel sink under the white cabinet.
action_steps.label: sink

action_steps.action: 3. Use the yellow sponge aligned with the faucet to scrub the dishes.
action_steps.label: sponge

action_steps.action: 4. Rinse the dishes using the water from the single handle stainless steel faucet.
action_steps.label: faucet

action_steps.action: 5. Retrieve a white ceramic pot from below the modern white kitchen cabinet.
action_steps.label: pot

action_steps.action: 6. Fill the pot with water and place it back on the stove to boil for cleaning.
action_steps.label: stove

action_steps.action: 1. Walk to the shorter one of two desks with monitors.
action_steps.label: desk

action_steps.action: 2. Choose either a Coca Cola bottle or a soda can from the variety displayed on the desk.
action_steps.label: cup

action_steps.action: 3. Sit on the black office chair under that same desk to enjoy your drink.
action_steps.label: office chair

seq_grounding.task_description: Adjust the office environment for comfort.

action_steps.action: 1. Approach the black fan near the white file cabinet.
action_steps.label: fan

action_steps.action: 2. Turn the fan towards the desk areas to circulate air better.
action_steps.label: fan

action_steps.action: 3. Return to the shorter desk ot two for further work.
action_steps.label: desk

seq_grounding.task_description: Make a phone call from the office phone.

action_steps.action: 1. Walk to the desk containing the white telephone.
action_steps.label: desk

action_steps.action: 2. Pick up the telephone receiver from the box on this desk.
action_steps.label: telephone

action_steps.action: 3. Dial the desired number and proceed with the phone call.
action_steps.label: telephone

action_steps.action: 4. Hang up the receiver after finishing the call.
action_steps.label: telephone

seq_grounding.task_description: Organize a small workshop in the conference room.

action_steps.action: 1. Walk to the black office chair closest to the door.
action_steps.label: chair

action_steps.action: 2. Move it next to the wooden table adorned with chairs.
action_steps.label: table

action_steps.action: 3. Retrieve the red backpack from the area of the grey plastic chair.
action_steps.label: backpack

action_steps.action: 4. Place the backpack on the nearby table.
action_steps.label: table

action_steps.action: 5. Walk to the whiteboard in the conference room.
action_steps.label: whiteboard

action_steps.action: 6. Position the whiteboard at a suitable angle where all participants can easily view it.
action_steps.label: whiteboard

action_steps.action: 7. Return to the vicinity of the black office chair and sit.
action_steps.label: chair

seq_grounding.task_description: Prepare the conference space for a formal meeting.

action_steps.action: 1. Walk to the chair with a red backpack.
action_steps.label: chair

action_steps.action: 2. Adjust it to face directly towards the wooden table at the center of the room.
action_steps.label: chair

action_steps.action: 3. Go to the cabinet near the painting of sunflowers and a yellow field.
action_steps.label: cabinet

action_steps.action: 4. Extract writing pads and pens from the cabinet.
action_steps.label: cabinet

action_steps.action: 5. Place these materials evenly spaced across the wooden table.
action_steps.label: table

action_steps.action: 6. Return to the chair beside the table and sit down to check the arrangement.
action_steps.label: chair

action_steps.action: 1. Collect unwanted mail and papers from the mailboxes near the copier.
action_steps.label: mailboxes

action_steps.action: 2. Walk to the trash can in front of the copier.
action_steps.label: trash can

action_steps.action: 3. Deposit the collected mail into this trash can.
action_steps.label: trash can

seq_grounding.task_description: Update notice on the bulletin board.

action_steps.action: 1. Approach the bulletin board beside the bin on top of the cabinet.
action_steps.label: bulletin board

action_steps.action: 2. Pin the new notice onto this bulletin board.
action_steps.label: bulletin board

action_steps.action: 1. Walk over to the small white refrigerator in the room.
action_steps.label: mini fridge

action_steps.action: 2. Open the refrigerator to take out a cold beverage.
action_steps.label: mini fridge

action_steps.action: 1. Go to the white cabinet that supports the printer.
action_steps.label: cabinet

action_steps.action: 2. Use the printer placed on this cabinet to print the documents.
action_steps.label: printer

action_steps.action: 3. Walk over to the bin to the right of this mailboxes to discard any unwanted papers.
action_steps.label: bin

action_steps.action: 4. Head back to the printer to retrieve your printed documents.
action_steps.label: printer

action_steps.action: 1. Go to the bin positioned to the left of the copier.
action_steps.label: bin

action_steps.action: 2. Shift papers or recyclable materials from the floor into this bin.
action_steps.label: bin

action_steps.action: 3. Walk to another bin, which is to the far right of the copier.
action_steps.label: trash can

action_steps.action: 4. Transfer any excess recyclable material from the surroundings here.
action_steps.label: trash can

action_steps.action: 1. Walk to the cabinet under the white mirror.
action_steps.label: bathroom vanity

action_steps.action: 2. Take out a fresh white towel from the bathroom vanity.
action_steps.label: towel

action_steps.action: 3. Go to the bathtub next to the bathroom vanity.
action_steps.label: bathtub

action_steps.action: 4. Lay the towel nearby on the grab bar.
action_steps.label: grab bar

action_steps.action: 5. Adjust the shower curtain for privacy.
action_steps.label: shower curtain

action_steps.action: 6. Start filling the bathtub with water using the bathtub's faucet.
action_steps.label: bathtub

seq_grounding.task_description: Watch a late-night movie in the bedroom.

action_steps.action: 1. Turn on the tv placed on the wooden cabinet.
action_steps.label: tv

action_steps.action: 2. Walk to the armchair in the corner, and next to the couch.
action_steps.label: armchair

action_steps.action: 3. Adjust the pillow on the armchair for comfort.
action_steps.label: pillow

action_steps.action: 4. Sit in the armchair to enjoy the movie.
action_steps.label: armchair

seq_grounding.task_description: Pack for an early morning departure.

action_steps.action: 1. Go to the suitcase next to the couch.
action_steps.label: suitcase

action_steps.action: 2. Place the suitcase on the bed beside the bathroom.
action_steps.label: bed

action_steps.action: 3. Collect items from around the room such as a jacket from the chair.
action_steps.label: jacket

action_steps.action: 4. Carefully pack these items into the suitcase.
action_steps.label: suitcase

action_steps.action: 5. Zip up and lock the suitcase for travel.
action_steps.label: suitcase

action_steps.action: 1. Walk to the dollhouse next to the mattress.
action_steps.label: dollhouse

action_steps.action: 2. Move the furniture inside the dollhouse to create a new arrangement.
action_steps.label: dollhouse

action_steps.action: 3. Place a toy gun from the bed into the dollhouse to add more elements to play with.
action_steps.label: bed

action_steps.action: 4. Sit beside the dollhouse on the mattress to continue playing.
action_steps.label: mattress

action_steps.action: 1. Pick up a book from the stack near the dresser.
action_steps.label: book

action_steps.action: 2. Sit on the mattress close to the nightstand that supports a small lamp.
action_steps.label: mattress

action_steps.action: 3. Turn on the lamp to provide light.
action_steps.label: lamp

action_steps.action: 4. Open the book and start reading.
action_steps.label: book

action_steps.action: 1. Pick up any toys scattered around the floor near the dollhouse.
action_steps.label: floor

action_steps.action: 2. Open the white dresser under the mirrorsand store the toys inside.
action_steps.label: dresser

action_steps.action: 3. Walk to the storage bin in front of the nightstand and dispose of trash.
action_steps.label: storage bin

action_steps.action: 4. Place the green trash can beside the storage bin to ease disposal of future rubbish.
action_steps.label: trash can

action_steps.action: 5. Smooth out the bed sheet and organize the pillows inside the bed.
action_steps.label: bed
